metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5793 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient policy enforcement in extensions in Google Chrome prior to73.0.3683.75 allowed a remote attacker to initiate the extensionsinstallation user interface via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
